title: Missing Config File Plz Help
body: I cant find my config file.  I went to  OC (C:)  -->  Riot Games  --> league of legends       but there is no config folder.   can someone please tell me how to find it?

replies.body: There won't be a config folder if you haven't made any changes with your settings  in-game.  I wouldn't recommend modifying your config folder should it appear, as it can cause issues in general.  If you're having an issue let me know, and I'm happy to help if I can!  Let me know!
Do you mean that if you did change something ingame then there will be no config folder?

Recently i have been having a problem with my game where after i load into game my computer freezes and i have to shut it off manually.  i checked the logs and it has given my errors such as:   000019.900| ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Globals/Globals.bin" because it's not in the manifest. 
000036.539| ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/SRUAP_Turret_Order1/SRUAP_Turret_Order1.bin" because it's not in the manifest. 
I went looking for a solution and someone told me to look in my configs folder.  When i couldn't find it I thought that may be the problem.
why the crap;  they should just  make a link to make it easier. I can't find it nether.

Try opening the LoL launcher, but don't click play. Look at the top right corner of the screen and click the question mark. Next click Repair and see if that works. A while ago my games kept crashing in loading screen, and that fixed it for me.
i have already tried repairing and reinstalling multiple times now   ;(
